publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5110.2 John Scott: Scotland’s National Parks—As an amendment to motion (S3M-5110) in the name of Roseanna Cunningham, insert at end "while also welcoming the reduction in the size of the boards of the National Park Authorities, thereby producing greater efficiencies by way of reducing running costs, and emphasising that the proposed National Parks Strategy group must have a clear timescale of operation and well defined sense of purpose in its objectives."
